snippet: A shelf full of automotive books is available for the holidays, including one that looks inside the garages of well-known rockers and another that celebrates the Corvette.
abstract: Charles McEwen introduces New York Times writers' reviews of books about automobiles.
lead_paragraph: A shelf full of automotive books is available for the holidays, including one that looks inside the garages of well-known rockers and another that celebrates the Corvette.

headline.seo: A Time to Turn Pages Instead of Corners
